basics.name: Sam Rawdon
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Hi, I'm an NYU computer science, math, and philosophy student who does fullstack development.

work.name: Incisive Computing Solutions
work.summary: Developed and launched a robust CRM system for 100+ companies, leveraging C#, SQL, ASP.NET, and WinForms to deliver advanced customer analytics, data storage, and seamless user interfaces. Implemented features and conducted bug fixes under tight deadlines, ensuring software reliability and on-time project milestones. Contributed to major design decisions and product strategy during regular development and implementation meetings; provide actionable suggestions during customer calls.

work.name: Cybertrol Engineering
work.summary: Worked with a team of four to orchestrate implementation and optimization of the PalletWorks product using Java. Overhauled API appearance using Javascript, HTML, and Swagger. Contributed to company meetings regarding marketing focus and future of product development.

education.area: Major in Computer Science, Minor in Mathematics, Minor in Philosophy
relevant courses: Intro to Computer Science, Data Structures, Computer Systems Org, Operating Systems, Algorithms, Agile and DevOps, Discrete Mathematics, Linear Algebra, Calculus II
Independent Project in CS, Advanced Programming I, Advanced Programming II
